Abilities.Description: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam cooldown increased from 117 to 130

- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Medicinal Specter|Size=20}} Medicinal Specter radius spirit power reduced from 0.07 to 0.05
